name: ESCAPE (itch) (Teelin)
description:
Can you escape before you run out of space…

You are stuck in a room with for challenges ahead of you and only one door. You Must complete all of the challenges to get the code to escape the room. And if that wasn’t hard enough the room is filling slowly with water.

(IT HAS LASERS)

It is a simple escape room with 4 challenges . You need to complete all of the challenges before the room fills with water and you drown.

Controls Simple WASD to move and mouse click and drag to look around. Each puzzle will change the camera view to zoom in and will have clickable parts (mainly buttons) If you get too deep in the water you will start to swim (Slide around) You can swim up with space and down with C

This is my attempt at a game for Ludum Dare 42 created by myself as a Solo.  It is the first game that I have made and the first one I've coded. Hope you enjoy playing as much as I had making.
